meanings.definition: Give (a gift that one has received) to someone else.
meanings.sent1: She regifts the scarf her friend gave her last year.
meanings.sent2: He regifts items he doesn't need to reduce clutter.
meanings.sent3: Mom regifts the candle to Dad, pretending she bought it just for him.
meanings.sent4: The idea of regifting old memories can be a way to spread joy.
meanings.sent5: Regifting can save money and reduce waste during the holidays.

meanings.definition: The act of giving a gift that one has received to someone else.
meanings.sent1: Regifts can sometimes lead to awkward situations.
meanings.sent2: She received a beautiful regift at the office gift exchange.
meanings.sent3: The regift from the party turned out to be the most popular item.
meanings.sent4: The regifts pile grew larger with each passing holiday season.
meanings.sent5: The regifts table at the charity event was a hit with attendees.
